description: Puts quantity over quality. Makes 10 cups.

steps.title: Measure & Grind
steps.instructions:
1. Fill the orange cup to the 1/2 mark with beans.
2. Pour the beans into Bunn Bean's hopper.
3. Set the grind to 11 o'clock.
4. Grind the beans and use the cup to catch them.

steps.title: Prep
steps.summary: Insert the filter and pour in the grounds
steps.instructions:
1. Put a filter in the percolator's basket.
2. Pour in the coffee grounds.
3. Re-insert the coffee basket into the percolator.

steps.title: Brew
steps.instructions:
1. Place the carafe below the percolator with the lid flipped up.
2. Press the `Half Pot` button on the percolator to start the brew.

Tip: Only use the `Half Pot` button, as the `Full Pot` button will cause the filter to overflow resulting in grounds in the coffee.
